subject: Fwd: Thank you, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$275,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this simple form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
